name: Havoc by AJ Fernandez - Belicoso
additionalNotes: AJ Fernández’s Havoc is a medium to full-bodied Nicaraguan cigar with spicy, earthy notes and subtly coffee notes. Produced by renowned cigar manufacturer AJ Fernández, this cigar stands out for its exceptional quality and taste. This cigar symbolizes opulence and luxury, inspired by the age of gladiators. Enjoy a unique experience with Havoc Gordo Cigars by AJ Fernández.
